TopicTitle: Plugging in Wacom Intuos 4 with KSP2 running, BSOD

Articles.Content: What it says in the title, when I plug in my Wacom tablet while the game is running I get a full system crash BSOD and restart.  Repeatable. With it already plugged in it seems to partially function in the game, right clicks are not recognized. Not sure if this is a KSP2 issue, but could be worth looking at as a USB device plugging in (like a controller) and hard crashing shouldn't be the case. Though the Wacom is not a purely USB class compliant only device, it does have its own drivers/software manager as well. Though many mice and other controls have gone that way as well like logitech.
Out of curiosity, are you using it with the little mouse accessory it comes with (or was that just on the Intuos 3? It's been a long time since I bought a new tablet).
